Articles.Content:
Preface: Apologies if this is in the wrong location. I couldn't find any specific place for such things.

Hello all!

I recently started streaming to share my obsession with KSP and perhaps enjoin more people to buy this wonderful software. Concurrently, I thought perhaps those already on the wagon might enjoy my myriad explosions.

Without further ado, http://www.twitch.tv/carcin0genesis

Thanks for watching!
